1.18.1.1.0.9-b1:
[A] Plant harvesting extended.
[A] Block breaking added (pickaxe).
[A] Tree Chopping implemented (axe).
[A] Trail rotation (sneak-click with ants).
[M] Textures more decent (for players with cribilitis).
1.18.1.1.0.6:
[A] Bonemeal fertilizing non-experimental.
[F] Fixed Potion insertion bug.
1.18.1.1.0.6-b2:
[M] Hive: Adaptive animal feeding cool-down (the more animals already seen, the slower the breeding speed).
[M] Trail: Itching damage for animals tuned down.
[M] Hive: Redstone pulse on input/output side added for sending off minecarts after loading/unloading.
1.18.1.1.0.6-b1:
[A] Hive: Item Disenchanting (Grind Stone) added.
[A] Trail: Item sorting with item frames added.
1.18.1.1.0.4: [F] Fixed Trail Redstone update for notify-only conditions.
1.18.1.1.0.2:
[F] Fixed vertical placement issue (thx geometricaldude).
[A] Added crop farming (experimental).
1.18.1.1.0.1:
[A] Added shearing and animal feeding.
[A] Added No-Ants indicator in the GUI.
[A] Added No-Ingredients indicator for composting.
1.18.1.1.0.1-b1:
[M] Slightly increased item collection range to Hopper Minecart range.
[A] Ant Hive color variants added (normal, sand covered, dirt covered).
1.18.1.1.0.0:
[R] Initial release.
[F] Fixed Furnace Processing missing fuel container item insertion.
[F] Tooltip typo fixed.
